member.name: T:EdugameCloud.Lti.Extensions.UriBuilderExtensions
member.summary: The uri builder extensions.

member.name: F:EdugameCloud.Lti.Extensions.UriBuilderExtensions.UriRfc3986CharsToEscape
member.summary: The set of characters that are unreserved in RFC 2396 but are NOT unreserved in RFC 3986.

member.name: M:EdugameCloud.Lti.Extensions.UriBuilderExtensions.AppendQueryArgument(System.UriBuilder,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a name-value pair to the end of a given URL as part of the querystring piece. Prefixes a ? or & before first element as necessary.
member.param: The UriBuilder to add arguments to.
The name of the parameter to add.
member.remarks: If the parameters to add match names of parameters that already are defined in the query string, the existing ones are not replaced.

member.name: M:EdugameCloud.Lti.Extensions.UriBuilderExtensions.AppendQueryArgs(System.UriBuilder,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: The append query args.

member.name: M:EdugameCloud.Lti.Extensions.UriBuilderExtensions.CreateQueryString(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: Concatenates a list of name-value pairs as key=value&key=value, taking care to properly encode each key and value for URL transmission according to RFC 3986. No ? is prefixed to the string.
member.param: The dictionary of key/values to read from.
member.returns: The formulated query string style string.

member.name: M:EdugameCloud.Lti.Extensions.UriBuilderExtensions.EscapeUriDataStringRfc3986(System.String)
member.summary: Escapes a string according to the URI data string rules given in RFC 3986.
member.remarks: The method is supposed to take on RFC 3986 behavior if certain elements are present in a .config file. Even if this actually worked (which in my experiments it doesn't), we can't rely on every host actually having this configuration element present.

member.name: M:EdugameCloud.Lti.Utils.AESGCM.NewKey
member.summary: Helper that generates a random new key on each call.

member.name: M:EdugameCloud.Lti.Utils.AESGCM.SimpleEncrypt(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Simple Encryption And Authentication (AES-GCM) of a UTF8 string.
member.remarks: Adds overhead of (Optional-Payload + BlockSize(16) + Message + HMac-Tag(16)) * 1.33 Base64

member.name: M:EdugameCloud.Lti.Utils.AESGCM.SimpleEncryptWithPassword(System.String,System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Simple Encryption And Authentication (AES-GCM) of a UTF8 String using key derived from a password (PBKDF2).
member.remarks: Significantly less secure than using random binary keys. Adds additional non secret payload for key generation parameters.

member.name: M:EdugameCloud.Lti.Utils.AESGCM.SimpleDecryptWithPassword(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Simple Decryption and Authentication (AES-GCM) of a UTF8 message using a key derived from a password (PBKDF2)
member.param: Length of the non secret payload.
member.remarks: Significantly less secure than using random binary keys.
